summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MBS NYC corporate website MVP - all core functionality working perfectly
passed_tests: Contact form POST submission with database storage
Contact form GET retrieval of submissions
Form validation for invalid data (422 status)
Homepage loading with hero section and navigation
Navigation between all 6 pages (Home, About, Services, Products, Partners, Contact)
Contact form UI with all required fields (name, email, company, message)
Contact form submission with success toast notification
CTA buttons navigation (Request Consultation → Contact, Explore Services → Services)
Mobile responsive design and mobile menu toggle
All page routing with React Router
